mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_NOTIFICATION (RECEIVER_ID, SENDER_ID, NOTI_TYPE, NOTI_MESSAGE, NOTI_URL, IS_READ, CREATED_TIME) VALUES (#{receiverId}, #{senderId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{notiType}, #{notiMessage}, #{notiUrl}, 'N', SYSTIMESTAMP)
mapper.select: SELECT ID, RECEIVER_ID, SENDER_ID, NOTI_TYPE, NOTI_MESSAGE, NOTI_URL, IS_READ AS "READ", CREATED_TIME FROM TBL_NOTIFICATION WHERE RECEIVER_ID = #{receiverId} AND IS_READ = 'N' ORDER BY ID DESC
